titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress regarding high level visits by democratically elected officials of Taiwan to the United States.
Expressing the sense of Congress regarding high level visits by democratically elected officials of Taiwan to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) it is in U.S. national interests to communicate directly with democratically elected and appointed officials of Taiwan, including the president of Taiwan; and (2) the United States should lift all restrictions on U.S. visits by high level officials of Taiwan.
